content: materials this is a great project to use up extra yarn here is what we used - 1 ball rowan 4 ply cotton in orchid - 1 ball rowan 4 ply cotton in bloom - 1 crochet hook 1 size b 2 5 mm - paper scissors - 12 pre-cut 3 5-inch x 5-inch cards or card stock in assorted colors - 1/8-inch hole punch 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805
